about_the_game:
Game Introduction: Strange Hunting Grounds

Welcome to Strange Hunting Grounds - a place shrouded in unknown dangers where countless monsters pour out from every exit. Here, you must rise to become the ultimate survivor.

Game Features:

Intense Battles with Monstrous Beasts
This is not your ordinary hunting ground. Engage in fierce battles against a multitude of monsters, each possessing unique abilities and strategies. Discover the perfect combination of weapons and special skills to unlock the key to survival.

Mission Accomplishments
Strange Hunting Grounds presents a variety of missions crucial for survival. Complete these tasks amidst intense combat and reap the rewards that will aid you in your journey.

Character Enhancement and Strategy
There are numerous ways to strengthen your character - from basic upgrades to evolutionary transcendence, rune synthesis, and equipment enhancements. Find the perfect synergy between special weapons and skills to craft the ultimate battle strategy.

Collectibles and Exploration
Explore the peculiar hunting grounds and collect a diverse array of monsters and items. Uncover new species of monsters and obtain powerful items that will enhance your combat abilities.

In Strange Hunting Grounds, you have the chance to script your own legend. Embrace the unknown perils that await and prove yourself as the most courageous hunter.

Strange Hunting Grounds is available now on Steam. Brave hunters, the grounds await your presence.

name: Strange Hunting Grounds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.6 GHz or Similar
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 11 compatible

short_description: A casual hack and slash game that conquers hell by creating a powerful expedition through a variety of skill & weapon combinations
